astray:Relic1.NAME: Apprentice's Notebook
astray:Relic1.FLAVOR: A seeker of knowledge is an apprentice.

astray:Relic2.NAME: Spellcasting Notebook
astray:Relic2.FLAVOR: These are the only things that belong to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace #yApprentice's #yNotebook . NL At the start of each combat, gain #b5 #yastray:Mana and [E] , and draw #b1 card.

astray:Relic3.NAME: Crystal Cube
astray:Relic3.FLAVOR: Not a cube that you should find in the books you have read.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] for every #b8 cards drawn. Reset at the end of each turn.

astray:Relic4.NAME: Picture Book of the Abyss
astray:Relic4.FLAVOR: You will be the door to it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b50% max HP upon pickup. At the FIRST turn of each combat, draw #b2 additional cards and enery is not consumed when playing cards.

astray:Relic5.NAME: Book of Star Wheel
astray:Relic5.FLAVOR: You took it with you sometime but haven't read it yet. Find a time to study it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn: When your hand becomes full, gain #b1 #yastray:Mana and [E] .

astray:Relic6.NAME: Gastric Pouch of Taotie
astray:Relic6.FLAVOR: A product of flesh and blood alchemical magic. Better not to be associated with its maker.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combats of Elites, restore #b24 HP.

astray:Relic7.NAME: Traveller's Kit
astray:Relic7.FLAVOR: A more relaxed way to get something wihout pays.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can #ySmith #b2 times when you enter a Rest room if your HP is above #b%d%% .

astray:Relic8.NAME: Experienced's Badge
astray:Relic8.FLAVOR: This is what you took with you from where you became a mage. Now you deserve it as well.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck, #yUpgrade a random card in your deck. Cards of lower rarity is chosen prior to others.

astray:Relic9.NAME: Burst Ice Pack
astray:Relic9.FLAVOR: Mainly used to create ice fog to facilitate your escape.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the starts of the first #b3 turns of each combat, apply #b2 #yastray:Frost to ALL enemies.

astray:Relic10.NAME: Miracle Wand
astray:Relic10.FLAVOR: "Miracles are knowledge of which one has no knowledge."
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenver you enter a Rest room, #yUpgrade #b1 non- #yastray:Enlighten cards in your deck at random.

astray:Relic11.NAME: Rune of Jigen's Mark
astray:Relic11.FLAVOR: Rune is never your forte... No one is...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b150 #ygolds . #rReplace Corrupt Heart with Jigen. Your #yStrength , #yDexterity , #yFocus , #yMagic , #yBlock and the #yastray:Frost and #yastray:Ember you apply can exceed the cap of #b999 .

astray:Relic12.NAME: Strange Meat
astray:Relic12.FLAVOR: No matter how much spice is added it doesn't taste good, and the good thing is it is never eaten up...
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a non combat room, restore #b6 HP. Restore #b6 additional HP when you enter a Rest room.
